name: docuseal
description: DocuSeal is a document signing and form-filling platform that can be self-hosted. It supports templates, workflows, audit trails, and a user-friendly signing experience, making it suitable for contracts, agreements, and HR paperwork automation.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Route documents through sequential approval chains with automated notifications and status tracking

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with external systems through REST APIs for automated document generation and processing workflows

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Enable simultaneous editing and review with live updates, comments, and version control

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access and sign documents on any device with responsive design and touch-friendly interfaces
